meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intensive.
meanings.sent1: Her study habits showed a great intensiveness in her approach to learning.
meanings.sent2: The intensiveness of the workout left him feeling exhausted but accomplished.
meanings.sent3: The intensiveness with which she organized her closet was both impressive and slightly amusing.
meanings.sent4: The intensiveness of his focus was like a laser beam, cutting through distractions effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The intensiveness of the storm made it impossible to go outside without getting soaked.

meanings.definition: The degree of intensity or strength.
meanings.sent1: The intensiveness of the argument between the siblings could be heard throughout the house.
meanings.sent2: The intensiveness of the flavors in the dish made it a memorable dining experience.
meanings.sent3: The intensiveness of his love for chocolate was evident in the number of chocolate bars he had in his room.
meanings.sent4: The intensiveness of the competition was like a fire driving each participant to do their best.
meanings.sent5: The intensiveness of the colors in the painting made it stand out among the rest.
